metadata.title: Réfutation des Mémoires de la Bastille : sur les principes généraux des loix, de la proba[bi]lité et de la vérité : dans une suite de lettres à Monsieur Linguet, ci-devant avocat au parlement de Paris /
metadata.creator: Evans, Thomas, solicitor.
Evans, Thomas, solicitor
metadata.publisher: A Londres : De l'imprimerie de Edw. Cox, imprimeur de la Compagnie des Indes orientales : Se vend chez J. Murray, Fleet-Street,
metadata.description: Translations of: Refutation of the Memoirs of the Bastille
The first letter only, dated 22 December 1783
"The imprint is false, being a repetition of that of the English edition; possibly printed in the Netherlands"--ESTC
Not in Martin & Walter. Révolution française
metadata.notes: Title page located on front cover. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Worn, damaged and discolored pages and cover. Skewed text.
